title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: Designed and scaled data-driven systems around geospatial and environmental datasets. Built ingestion pipelines with to process large JSON datasets, architected GIS layers for renewable energy planning, and developed on-demand reporting services. Developed CI/CD pipelines for deployment to EC2 and AWS Lambda.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Worked on the backend of a mobile-first U.S. based consultation platform. Engineered microservices, refactored and migrated database schemas, optimized queries, and wrote technical documentations.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed full-stack solutions, achieving Top Rated status and 4.75/5 rating across 8+ projects. Worked on a basketball sports management platform covering features including player/stats management, play-by-play tracking, video compression, highlights generation from events, and adaptive playback.

title: Technical Author
description: Author technical articles on programming, infrastructure, and Linux internals. Published 150+ articles for 12+ million readers on the platform worldwide. Conducted deep research on 2500+ on technical topics for 50+ authors. Ranked top 5% of contributors.
